name: ai-text-humanizer
description: ZAYUVALYA - AI Humanizer is a free, open-source tool designed to help users rephrase and humanize text effortlessly. Built with simplicity and efficiency in mind, this tool ensures that your text is transformed into a more natural and human-like form while preserving its original meaning. ZAYUVALYA - AI Humanizer operates entirely in the browser, making it accessible, private, and 100% free to use without any login required.
